title: Samsung Galaxy S4
comment: Works fine.  Just wish I could find it in my app list without having to go back to Google Play to do a search of "home switchers" to see what app I downloaded just to find its name (it's advertised as "Home Switcher / Manager" in Google Play yet in app list it's "Twisted Home Manager").  Sounds petty, but when you don't use this app frequently it's very annoying - annoying enough to finally uninstall it and get something I can find when I  need   it!  It should be under HOME... (as advertised), not TWISTED!
Nice job!

title: Seems to work fine on my S4
comment: This is a really clever and light-weight app that seems to work fine. I'm a little tentative because I've only used it for a few minutes so far so I haven't had a chance to see any longer term issues, which may show its ugly head. But so far works as advertised. The widget needs work though. If it allowed to create a widget like a shortcut to a predefined home launcher it would be best. Otherwise using a shortcut to the app and then switching using the app is also quite quick. It would remove a step if the widget worked as I mentioned for people like me who are looking to occasionally switch between Touchwiz and Nova. For now 5 stars from me.

title: Great app but switches back to default frequently
comment: I use Home Switcher to manage a variety of launchers but several times each day, when exiting any given app, it will automatically switch back to the stock / default launcher. Then I have to run Home Switcher and pick the launcher I want to use. This happens even when the third-party launcher is set as the default launcher. Five stars if someone can figure out how to fix this problem. Thanks!

title: Great!
comment: It seems to be working great for me so far! Pretty slick (partially due to not having to large of rows like some other home managers, causing one to have to scroll if they have lots of launchers) and best of all; no ads.    Edit: I emailed the developer about wanting to switch to a higher res, prettier icon, and they got back to me and followed through! Less than 30 hours later, we have this new icon, which I very much prefer. Fantastic, 5 stars are not enough!
